Pre-Game Insights: Tim Seifert is expected to replace Williamson in the playing XI.
Pakistan are now fighting to keep the series alive after losing the first two contests.
Another defeat will extend their wait for a first T20I series win since 2022 and their batters will have to show improvement if they harbour hopes of a decider.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The contest will be played in Dunedin which has traditionally been batting friendly.
The match will be held at University Oval in Dunedin
The contest will get underway from 5:30 AM IST.
